## Required Packages

  * here
  
  * dplyr
  
  * DT
  
  * rtweet
  
  * workflowr

```r
install.packages(
  c(
    "here", 
    "devtools", 
    "dplyr", 
    "DT", 
    "rtweet", 
    "workflowr"
  )
)
```
